caption.p: Effects of B. atroviridis on the evolution of glycemia. Each point represents mean ± ESM, n = 5. ∗P < 0.05, ∗∗P < 0.01, and ∗∗∗P < 0.001 indicate significant difference between diabetic control and treat groups at a given day. ## P < 0.01 and ### P < 0.001 indicate significant difference between normal control and diabetic control and at a given day. $ P < 0.01 and $$$ P < 0.001 indicate significant difference between normal control and treated groups at a given day.
